patient_info: Hematuria,Jaundice,Skin rash,Cirrhosis,Ascites,Hyperammonemia,Conjugated hyperbilirubinemia,Hypoalbuminemia,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Elevated circulating creatine kinase concentration,Abdominal distention,Increased total bilirubin,Prolonged prothrombin time,Pedal edema,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Abnormal urinary color,Increased urinary porphobilinogen,Abnormality of hepatobiliary system physiology,Hypoactive bowel sounds,Elevated circulating aspartate aminotransferase concentration,Elevated circulating alanine aminotransferase concentration,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Wilson disease/hepatolenticular degeneration (primary disorder of copper metabolism)
2. Acute intermittent porphyria (enzymatic defect of heme biosynthesis results in accumulation of precursors)
3. Byler disease/neonatal intrahepatic cholestasis caused by citrin deficiency (autosomal recessive disorder of bile secretion)
4. Hemochromatosis (inherited disorder of iron metabolism causing tissue damage due to iron overload)
5. Biliary atresia/extrahepatic biliary atresia (congenital abnormality causing absence of the bile ducts)
6. Dubin-Johnson syndrome (autosomal recessive defect of bilirubin metabolism characterized by conjugated hyperbilirubinemia)
7. Gilbert syndrome (autosomal dominant disorder characterized by mild, unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia without liver damage)
8. Rotor syndrome (autosomal recessive disorder characterized by conjugated hyperbilirubinemia without liver damage)
9. Paucity of intrahepatic bile ducts/Alagille syndrome (genetic disorder characterized by abnormalities of bile ducts, heart, eyes, and skeleton)
10. Primary biliary cholangitis (chronic autoimmune liver disease characterized by destruction of intrahepatic bile ducts)
